title: 📖 How to Play Sudoku
intro: Sudoku is a logic-and-numbers game. You don’t need advanced math—just your brain and some patience!
objectiveText: Fill the board by placing numbers in the empty cells without repeating them in any row, column, or 3×3 box.

boardList.item3: Some cells already have numbers (these cannot be changed).

rulesList.item1: Each row must contain the numbers 1 through 9 with no repeats.
rulesList.item2: Each column must contain the numbers 1 through 9 with no repeats.
rulesList.item3: Each 3×3 box must also contain the numbers 1 through 9 with no repeats.

strategiesList.item1: Begin with rows, columns, and boxes that already have more numbers.
strategiesList.item2: Use logic: if a row already has 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, and 9, the only missing cell must be 4!
strategiesList.item3: Don’t guess randomly: Sudoku is solved with deductions, not luck.

funText: Have fun! Sudoku is a puzzle that trains your mind, makes you think, and you’ll get faster over time.
